name: FlightlessBirdFight
description:
You are chickens, and you play against penguins!

Click on your source field to target another field, and half of your chickens in the field will move to the target field!

All fields under control produce units other time.

Bigger field will produce twice the unit than smaller one.

Fields with wheat offers a unit's production bonus

Fields with pumpkins and carrots offers a speed movement boost

____

Assets utilisés:

https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-farm

https://caz-creates-games.itch.io/lil-penguin-character-sprite

https://caz-creates-games.itch.io/cute-chicken-2-character-sprite

https://nyknck.itch.io/fx057
